p: Piper majusculum EO from Indonesia contained no monoterpenes, but was dominated by sesquiterpenes: β-caryophyllene (17.27%), caryophyllene oxide (14.26%), α-selinene (14.21%), cis-calamenene (9.62%), spathulenol (8.76%), α-bergamotene (7.02%), α-copaene (5.88%), ( Z)-α-bisabolene (4.95%), β-bisabolene (4.13%), δ-cadinene (2.80%), α-cubebene (2.64%), α-humulene (2.25%) [ 108].
